      • createRootCA

        public static final KeyStore createRootCA()
                                   throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Creates a new Root CA certificate and returns private and public key as KeyStore. The KeyStore.getDefaultType() is used.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - If no providers are found for 'RSA' key pair generator or 'SHA1PRNG' Secure random number generator
        IllegalStateException - in case of errors during assembling KeyStore
